description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'NotesList' which displays a list of notes, provides functionality to add, select, and delete notes, and manages associated state and subscriptions.

classes.name: NotesList
classes.description: A LightningJS component rendering a list of notes with functionality to add, select, and delete notes.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Initializes the component and subscribes to notes updates.

methods.name: destroy
methods.description: Cleans up subscriptions when component is destroyed.

methods.name: $onTrashHover
methods.description: Handles hover event over trash icon for a note.

methods.name: $onTrashLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leave event from trash icon.

methods.name: $onAddHover
methods.description: Handles hover over the add new note button.

methods.name: $onAddLeave
methods.description: Handles mouse leave from the add button.

methods.name: $emitSelect
methods.description: Updates selected note ID and emits selection event.

methods.name: $handleNew
methods.description: Creates a new note and selects it.

methods.name: $remove
methods.description: Removes a note after confirmation, updates the list, and manages selection.
